citation: Proclamation under the Liquor Licensing Amendment (Liquor and Gaming Administrative Restructuring) Act 2015 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Liquor Licensing Amendment (Liquor and Gaming Administrative Restructuring) Act 2015

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Liquor Licensing Amendment (Liquor and Gaming Administrative Restructuring) Act 2015 fix 12 August 2015 as the day on which that Act commences.

21 July 2015

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

PETER GUTWEIN

Treasurer

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 29 July 2015

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Treasury and Finance.
